WorkItem.Description:
a lot of methods has parameter with default values, these parameter are not marked as optional parameters in COM Type Library but there are optional in reality. NetOffice doesnt support additional overloads for these methods currently and a client must give all parameters or Missing.Value.
task: create overloads for these methods.

Comments.Message:
the following table shows all methods with one or more parameters there have a default value.
